attributes.action: do all in his power to influence the BBC to designate one tv channel a "no foul language " where the older generation can enjoy films and drama as they could some years ago.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there are numerous channels dedicated to children why not one for the older people .we were quite happy some 10 years ago when the language on films was edited out and it was not used in tv dramas.can we have the good old days back please.
